title: Electric fields and moving media
brief_description: “Summary: this fils is one of a series concerned with fields and forces as they interact with deformable media. here is presented a study of a group of experiments which focus attention on the simple types of electromechanical interactions relevant to both natural phenomenon such as lighting and complex technological achievements exemplified by The Van De Graff Generator. Narrated by james r. melcher”
